name: Tealinux Software Center
body:
### Download
   
You can download this project in either [ZIP](https://github.com/ylpmiskrad/tealinux-software-center/zipball/master) or [TAR](https://github.com/ylpmiskrad/tealinux-software-center/tarball/master) formats.

You can also clone the project with Git by running:

`$ git clone git://github.com/ylpmiskrad/tealinux-software-center.git`

### Authors

* This software created by Linux Deepin team
* Remixed by TealinuxOS team:
  Reza Faiz A <ylpmiskrad@gmail.com>

### Version
v2.0

### Features

* Install/Remove application without "apt-get install/remove", just click :)
* This application can find easily application Linux

### Install
